name: Cinelli Book - The Art and Design of the Bicycle. Limited Edition.
description:
A must for fans. Deluxe gift box edition for the Cinelli book:The Art and Design of the Bicycle. Limited to 200 copies, numbered and hand signed by Antonio Colombo, carefully guarded in an exclusive slipcase together with a replica of the very famous Cinelli wool cap, entirely made in Italy.
288 pages, 220 color pictures, 222x30x292mm.

name: Cycling hat Superleggero Zero limited edition "Anniversaire"
description:
Superleggero Zero limited edition "anniversaire" is dedicated to the 100 edition of the Tour de France. 90% extra fine merino wool and 10% cashmere
One size fit all. Only 39 gr. / 1.3 oz. Stay warm!

name: Superleggero six mix pins
description: Superleggero pins are dedicated to the most beautiful jerseys of the Giro and Tour. A touch of elegance on your outfit. Six units inside.

name: Campagnolo Pista wheelset F/R
description:
A noble and fascinating specialty with an exclusively specific feature: the transformation of the explosive power of the quadriceps of top track cyclists into pure speed, with the minimum possible waste of energy.
Designed to maximize the rigidity and resistance to bending and torsional radial strength, the Pista™ wheel has aluminium 38mm rim and stainless steel spokes to provide better reaction and power.
Weight: front wheel 995gr; rear wheel 1040gr. Spokes: 20 front wheel; 24 rear wheel. Spacing: 100mm front wheel; 120mm rear wheel. Only for tubolars.

name: Cinelli Mash Histogram Frameset
description:
Cinelli Mash Histogram size 55(c/c)
Tube set Columbus Airplane alu 7005-T6 for just 1500gr. Fork Columbus Pista 1-1/8" for just 500gr. Bottom bracket BSA. 120mm spacing.
Those who think it’s just a new colorway don’t know what’s under the hood. This new geometry plays to the preferences of particular riders. The ride is suited to high cornering loads, fast switchbacks and scissors like movements dancing in the streets. This new frame is a black, grey and blue stealth-mode version of the ‘histogram’ graphic designed by MASH SF rider Garrett Chow. Definitely fast-twitch and hair-trigger. Built with the same high-end Columbus tube set as the original MASH ‘Bolt’ frame, but with even steeper head and seat tube angles plus a raised bottom bracket with the geo stamped under the shell.

name: Assos Aero wheel set NOS
description: Assos Aero wheel set, Campagnolo Strada Record hubs, stainless aerodynamic spokes, nipples ergal, 700c, width 16mm, 28holes. Made in Swiss. Available after september 15, 2013

name: System U cycling team caps
description:
Classic `80 cycling team caps.
Made in Italy from high quality cotton, the System U cycling team cap is leightweight and perfect for wearing under your helmet. 100%cotton, made in Italy. Maschine wash cool.

name: Molteni cycling team cap
description:
Classic `80 cycling team caps.
Made in Italy from high quality cotton, the Molteni cycling team cap is leightweight and perfect for wearing under your helmet.100%cotton, made in Italy. Maschine wash cool.

name: Brooklyn cycling team cap
description:
Classic `80 cycling team caps.
Made in Italy from high quality cotton, the Brooklyn cycling team cap is leightweight and perfect for wearing under your helmet. 100%cotton, made in Italy. Maschine wash cool. Brooklyn cap is one of the 2013 vintage collection including Bianchi-Bic-Brooklyn-Clement- Mercatone uno-Mercier-Molteni-Panasonic-Peugeot-Reynolds-Renault-Salvarani-Scic-Z-Vetements.

name: Campagnolo Omega Strada V Profile
description: Campagnolo Omega strada hardox Aero, only one complete front wheel, 36 holes, Campagnolo Pista Hub high flange, Tufo tubolar S3pro 21mm. Used only for training in the velodrome. Made in Italy.Available November, 2013. Also available a complete new set of FW/RW(without tubolar).

name: Cinelli Mash Pentachrome CXSS
description:
Cinelli Mash Pentachrome CXSS size 53.5.
A new creation, based on collaboration with the MASH SF team: a single-speed cyclocross frame made with Columbus Zonal triple-butted aluminium tubing. Quick, responsive, precise, outfitted with a monocoque carbon 1-1/2” fork that absorbs vibrations and improves riding performance.
Rear 120mm hub for improved wheel cambering, for better balance and response. The wheel clearance has been increased to avoid catching mud inside. The rear triangle is shorter than that of a traditional cyclocross frame, for easy handling even on the most technical routes.
Columbus Zonal tube set; Columbus fork CX Carbon Monocoque 1-1/2"(440gr); Seatpost diam.316mm; Weight 1560gr; BSA Bottom bracket threading.

name: Cinelli Replica Wool Jersey
description: The new old Cinelli 1970 jersey made by De Marchi is a triumph of design and tradition. Merino Wool construction, mother-of-pearl buttons, cornely embroidery. Colour: Grey , 50% wool 50% acrylic . Made in Italy.

name: Cinelli Mash T-Shirt Metallic Green 2010
description: This fantastic T-shirt was designed by Benny Gold and inspirated by the 2010 Cinelli Mash metallic green frame. 100% cotton, made in Italy by Ciclismo Totale. Size available nr.1 M and 2 XL. So hurry!

name: Mavic Mach2 CD2
description:
Set of two rims Mavic Mach2 CD2, 32 holes, emr7 stainless steel eyelet. Good conditions(used). Made in France.
 Available after september 15, 2013.

name: Cinelli Mash T-Shirt Mish Mash grey
description: This fantastic T-shirt was designed by Benny Gold and inspirated by the 2009 Cinelli Mash Mish Mash grey frame. 100% cotton, made in Italy by Ciclismo Totale. Size available: one in M, three in L and one XL. So hurry!

name: Nisi Sludi mod.290 Silver NOS
description: Nisi Sludi mod.290 rim, 700c, 24 holes, silver polish, tubular, with the beautiful metal Nisi Moncalieri badge. Made in Italy.  3 rims still available.

name: Cinelli Giro d'Italia 64 handlebar NOS
description: No words! Ride with a part of the world history of "grande ciclismo". And love the incredible perfection of small details. Only size 40. Never used, still in the original Cinelli pink plastic wrap. Made in Italy.  Available after september 15, 2013.

name: Cerchi Martano rims
description: Martano rims. One of the best tubular rims available early 1970's. 700c, 28 holes, 360gr, silver hand polish. Made in Italy. Set of two rims.

name: Cinelli Alter stem black or silver NOS
description: Alter, other, alien. Cinelli Alter ahead road stem.  Reticular complex structure, CNC maschined aluminium alloy AL 6082 T6. Clamp diameter 26,0, angle 80°, weight 210gr(120mm) One of the most desired of all classic stem. Still in the original Cinelli purple packaging. Silver or black. Never installed or mounted. Made in Italy. Now available!

name: Chain-L Bicycle Chain Oil.
description:
Chain-L Bicycle Chain Oil.
The best chain oil I ever tried. Fantastic in every conditions, fantastic for every condition. Read my full report 
http://aerodinamiche.com/2010/03/26/aw2010/
Deutsche Übersetzung findet man hier: 
http://aerodinamiche.com/2012/05/29/how-to-use-chain-l/

name: Campagnolo Record Strada hub
description:
Campagnolo Record Strada front hub, high flange, 36 holes, oil port holes covered by a black clip. Very good conditions, used but totally revisioned.
Available after september 15, 2013.

name: Bike cap Cinelli Il Grande Ciclismo
description: Cappellino Cinelli Il Grande Ciclismo, 100% lightweight cotton twill made in USA. One size fits all. Available in black or white

name: Look Titanium ahead 1" stem NOS
description: Original Look Titanium ahead stem, size 90/100/110 available. Weight only 125gr.(90mm) Now available!

name: Bike cap Cinelli Columbus Tubi speciali
description: Cappellino Columbus Tubi speciali per biciclette speciali, 100% lightweight cotton twill, made in USA. One size fits all.
